id.description: The unique identifier of the post

threadId.description: The ID of the thread the post belongs to

conversationId.description: The ID of the conversation the post belongs to

createdDateTime.description: The date and time the post was created

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The date and time the post was last modified

@odata.etag.description: Entity tag used for cache control and optimistic concurrency

changeKey.description: The key used for change tracking of the post

categories.description: Categories associated with the conversation post.

receivedDateTime.description: The date and time the post was received

hasAttachments.description: Indicates whether the post has attachments

body.description: The main content of the conversation post.

contentType.description: The type of content in the post (e.g., text, HTML)

from.description: The sender of the conversation post.

address.description: The email address of the sender

sender.description: The sender of the conversation post.

address.description: The email address of the sender
